Text.Page:
It got dark...I don't think Tiaran feels good.

I'm scared, .

After playing with Anya, and the young girl encountered a small horde of agitated ghilliedhus.

The ghilliedhus were attempting to feed off of Tiaran's roots, until stopped them.

Oh, no! Ghilliedhus!

They're mean! They steal the sap from Tiaran's roots and it makes her sick!

You have to stop them, ! I'll go get Uncle Emun!"I'll stop them, Anya. You be careful!"

You just defeated three ghilliedhus pretty much by yourself, ! If I hadn't seen it, I wouldn't have believed it!

I wonder what they're doing here? We've never had ghilliedhus out on the island before..."How did they get here?"
